fixes.name: Delta Down CAD 30Y Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD 30Y] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: This is a row-level calculation that multiplies two calculated fields. Converted each Tableau field reference to the DAX 'Table'[Column] format and implemented as a calculated column.
